data.eml:eml: A new genus and new species of Aeptini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae) from Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Faúndez, Eduardo I., Rider, David A. (2019): A new genus and new species of Aeptini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae) from Australia. Zootaxa 4658 (1): 189-192, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4658.1.11
